attributes.action: Set a minimun wage for working public holidays at a minimum of double time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the current increases in the cost of liviing, brought on by the unresonably high cost of diesel and petrol, i petition the government ot set the basic mininum wage at £6ph for adults, with co-responding increases for those in other age groups. I also petition the government to make the payment of double or tripple time, plus unsocial hours pay for to ALL workers that work over night, including public holidays compulsory to all employees by their employers.
